answers.answer: I hear ya this is my second and I'm almost 17 weeks pregnant and my first 3 months I was so sick I couldn't work, It was completely debilitating.  Now I'm on bed rest due to bleeding.  I'm sore every where and tired.  My first pregnancy was easy, this one has been no walk in the park.  Ur not alone. I take comfort in knowing I will have a new little man in my life and that it wasn't for nothing.  Hang in there :)

My first pregnancy was wonderful I barely got sick at all no problems nothing with this one they can't even figure out how far along I really am one minute I'm 12 weeks the next 16 weeks now they are saying I'm 14 weeks today I've been put on bed rest due to bleeding and have severe back and hip pains. Your so not alone!

I hate this pregnancy as,well, this is my second. My first was with twins and it was really easy. This one is a singleton and I just can't wait till I have the baby I wish they can just take him out now. IM always sick or in pain and just found out I have gestational diabetes, weepee more for me to enjoy. May 16 can't come any faster.

question: I am hating pregnancy!! This is my 3rd child, I am so frustrated this go around! Can't sleep, so much pain!! Please tell me I am not alone!! I cry just about daily just wishing this was over and I could hold my boy!!
title: 29 weeks 4 days
